title: Calling Line Identification for Voice Mail Messages
abstract: This document describes a method for identifying the originating calling party in the headers of a stored voice mail message.  Two new header fields are defined for this purpose: Caller_ID and Called_Name.  Caller_id is used to store sufficient information for the recipient to callback, or reply to, the sender of the message.  Caller-name provides the name of the person sending the message.
